response.overview: Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor.
response.tagline: 10 will fight, 9 will die. You get to watch.
response.title: The Condemned

titles.title: Los Condenados (La Isla De Los Condenados)
